message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000.  I believe it will be highly beneficial to your endeavors.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While I understand your perspective, the product's value is significantly higher than your proposed price.  I could consider letting it go for $1,150,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $1,150,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $1,050,000. I believe that's a fair price for both of us.
